About

Hi! I’m Wing-Sum, a mechanical engineering PhD student with an interest in mechanical engineering applications to human biology. I currently research biophysics of cell migration in the Chaudhuri Lab at Stanford University.

When not in lab, you might find me…

  • dancing with Stanford Dv8,
  • drawing,
  • cooking,
  • or relaxing with my rabbits
